meanings.sent1: The old socks were the pongiest in the room.
meanings.sent2: The garbage can was the pongiest thing in the kitchen.
meanings.sent3: The pongiest cheese made everyone wrinkle their noses.
meanings.sent4: The pongiest odor filled the entire house, making it hard to breathe.
meanings.sent5: The pongiest stench lingered in the air long after the source was removed.

meanings.definition: The most unpleasant or offensive smell
meanings.sent1: The locker room had the pongiest after a hot game.
meanings.sent2: The pongiest in the sewer made the workers gag.
meanings.sent3: The pongiest from the skunk made the dog run away.
meanings.sent4: The pongiest of all was the smell of rotten eggs.
meanings.sent5: The pongiest in the room was so bad, it made people sick.
